short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A distraction-free experience at webcomics using Hiveworks

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple extension created out of the desire to read a webcomic with my hands only on the directional keys and without distractions.

This extension adds a few keyboard functions to all webcomics which are internally based on Hiveworks, such as Sleepless Domain or Kiwi Blitz.

You can use the ESC key to toggle the "read mode" which will just display the current page of the webcomic and nothing else (see screenshot). You might want to combine it with fullscreen (F11).

You can use the left and right directional keys to go to the next/previous page.

You can use F9 to switch between the "shrink-to-fit" mode (which always shows a full page and shrinks it to fit into the browser window - good for higher resolutions) and the "scroll" mode (which shows the image with full height and lets you scroll using up/down).

A toast message will appear at the top when a page is supported by HiveNoDistract. Your last settings are saved for each website individually and automatically applied.

Note: The icon comes from http://iconka.com
